cheats.cheat: Sets your current Bucks. Restart, or complete any mission/skill/event to refresh your bucks.
Sets your current Experience. Restart, or complete any mission/skill/event to refresh your XP.
Sets your current Player Level. Restart, or complete any mission/skill/event to refresh your Player Level.
Sets your current Crew Credits. Restart, or complete any Mission to refresh your Crew Credits.

[Restart Required] Add a car or multiple cars to your save. Enter the Entity ID (Big Endian Hex string) of the Car Model, or a specific Vehicle Config. For example: "0x079392d1, 0x07926525" will grant you a Ferrari F40, and a Mini Countryman.

[Restart Required] Removes a car or multiple cars and all their specs from your save. Enter the Entity ID (Big Endian Hex string) of the Car Model. For example: "0x079392d1, 0x07926525" will remove your Ferrari F40, and Mini Countryman, if you have either. Be careful!
Missions: How much CC to give per mission complete.
[Restart Required] Unfogs the entire map, allowing you to fast travel anywhere.
[Restart Required] Unlocks locked Game Content: Locked Vehicles, Faction Missions, PVP missions, items, etc. Also allows you to buy DLC/Crew Credit-only cars with bucks!
CAU Crates: 100% of winning a fragment instead of bucks.
CAU Crates: Always win a fragment car for each CAU Crate run.
